audioText: Mon chien parle aux autres animaux du parc.
question: Mon chien ______ aux autres animaux du parc.
explanation: The text states 'Mon chien parle aux autres animaux du parc' - My dog talks to the other animals in the park. With 'mon chien' (my dog), we use 'parle' - the third person singular form of 'parler' (to talk/speak).
source: Basic animal behavior description with anthropomorphism
